authLayout.subtitle: A modern SaaS experience to manage your appointments, patients and schedule.

landing.headline: Manage your medical practice with ease
landing.subtitle: Dokal centralizes your appointments, patients, messaging and schedule in a modern and intuitive interface. Focus on your patients, we handle the rest.
landing.featuresSubtitle: A complete suite of tools designed to simplify managing your medical practice every day.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage your appointments in real time. Automatic confirmations, cancellations and reminders so you never miss a thing.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Set up your availability and manage your timetable flexibly and efficiently.

messaging.title: Messaging
messaging.description: Communicate with your patients securely and centrally, directly from the platform.

patients.title: Patient records
patients.description: Access health profiles, appointment histories and medical information in one click.

landing.ctaTitle: Ready to simplify your daily routine?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join the practitioners who trust Dokal to manage their medical practice.
landing.screenshotsSubtitle: A preview of Dokal's key screens: appointments, schedule, messaging and more.
landing.footerDescription: The SaaS platform dedicated to practitioners to centralize appointments, patients and scheduling.
landing.loggingOutMessage: You will be redirected to the home page.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Dokal, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy describes the information we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.section1Content:
We collect the following personal data when you use our platform:

• Identification information: last name, first name, email address, phone number.
• Professional information: medical specialty, license number, office address.
• Usage data: connection logs, platform interactions, preferences.
• Appointment data: information related to appointments managed through the platform.
privacy.section2Content:
Your data is processed for the following purposes:

• Creation and management of your practitioner account.
• Provision and improvement of our practice management services.
• Communication regarding your use of the service.
• Compliance with our legal and regulatory obligations.
privacy.section3Content:
The processing of your data is based on:

• The performance of the contract between us when you use Dokal.
• Your explicit consent for certain specific processing.
• Our legitimate interests in improving and securing the service.
• Compliance with our legal obligations.
privacy.section4Content: Your personal data is retained as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion, your data will be erased within 30 days, except for data we are required to retain by law.
privacy.section5Content:
We never sell your personal data. It may be shared with:

• Our technical subcontractors (hosting, email delivery) strictly within the scope of providing the service.
• Competent authorities when required by law.
privacy.section6Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data: encryption of data in transit and at rest, strict access controls, regular security audits.
privacy.section7Content:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right to access your personal data.
• Right to rectify inaccurate data.
• Right to erasure of your data.
• Right to data portability.
• Right to object to and restrict processing.

To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@dokal.com
privacy.section8Content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us at: privacy@dokal.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern access to and use of the Dokal platform. By signing up, you unconditionally accept these Terms.
terms.section1Content: Dokal is a SaaS platform designed for healthcare practitioners, enabling the management of appointments, patient records, scheduling and messaging.
terms.section2Content: Access to Dokal is restricted to healthcare professionals. When registering, you certify that you are a practicing professional and provide accurate information. You are responsible for keeping your login credentials confidential.
terms.section3Content:
You agree to:

• Use the platform in accordance with its intended purpose.
• Not attempt to bypass security measures.
• Not use the service for unlawful purposes.
• Respect the confidentiality of patient data.
terms.section4Content: The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy. Dokal is committed to complying with the GDPR and all applicable data protection regulations.
terms.section5Content: All elements of the Dokal platform (interface, code, logos, content) are protected by intellectual property rights. Any unauthorized reproduction, modification or use is strictly prohibited.
terms.section6Content:
Dokal strives to ensure the availability and reliability of the service. However, Dokal shall not be liable for:

• Service interruptions due to maintenance or technical reasons.
• Indirect damages resulting from the use of the service.
• Data loss in the event of force majeure.
terms.section7Content: You may terminate your account at any time from your profile settings. Dokal reserves the right to suspend or delete an account in the event of a breach of these Terms.
terms.section8Content: Dokal reserves the right to amend these Terms at any time. You will be notified of any material changes. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the amended Terms.
terms.section9Content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts of Paris.
terms.section10Content: For any questions regarding these terms, contact us at: legal@dokal.com
